newsLetterButton.success: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!

contactForm.wentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again later

notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found

tooltips.initialDailyEmissions: Total MOR tokens emitted to all groups initially
tooltips.balance: Total amount of MOR tokens held in the Capital Pool
tooltips.dailyAccrual: Amount of MOR tokens added to the pool from daily emissions
tooltips.totalLocked: Total amount of stETH locked in the capital pool
tooltips.totalVirtualStaked: Total Staked stETH in Capital Pool with multiplier accounted for as of today
tooltips.rewardEstimate: This can change drastically depending on how much more stETH other people stake
tooltips.percentageYield: Reward divided by initial deposit value
tooltips.percentageYieldWithMultiplier: Reward with multiplier divided by initial deposit value
tooltips.newInitialValue: Virtual initial value, New initial value after multiplier applied
tooltips.timePeriod: How long to lock your claims
tooltips.multiplier: Power factor awarded for locking claims

metricsPage.disclaimerTooltip: All USD values are based on the current MOR and stETH price and do not account for future price changes.
metricsPage.disclaimerMain: Calculated amounts in USD assume a stable current MOR & stETH price.
metricsPage.disclaimerStaking: You stake your stETH with us and get MOR tokens as a reward, you may lock yourself from claiming those MOR rewards to get a multiplier, you may unstake your stETH anytime.
